old:
みんなで力を合わせて立ち上がれば――
でも、上手くいかないものね
なかなか協力してくれる方がいなくて
column2: If everyone were to come together and work as a team, but it's not going so well. It's hard to find people willing to cooperate.
speaker: Madeline

old: ふぅ、私だってやればできるわ
column2: Phew, I can do it too if I try
speaker: Madeline

old:
少し休もうかしら
誰も手を貸してくれないんだもの
column2: Maybe I should take a short rest. Since no one is lending a hand.
speaker: Madeline
